SELECT T.TIME, OTR.YEAR_DATE FROM TIMETABLE T, (SELECT O.OT_ID, O.TIMETABLE_ID, O.YEAR_DATE FROM OPENING_TIME O, (SELECT OT_ID FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum}) R WHERE O.OT_ID = R.OT_ID AND YEAR_DATE LIKE #{date} ORDER BY YEAR_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TIMETABLE_ID)) OTR WHERE T.TIMETABLE_ID = OTR.TIMETABLE_ID ORDER BY T.TIME, OTR.YEAR_DATE
